backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature reports mapping app requirements to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of each frontend file’s purpose and role.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page mounting the React app via root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing image upload, processing params, preview rendering, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/EnhancementContr: UI card offering sliders for brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpen, and smoothing with apply/reset actions.
frontend/src/components/ExportControls.t: UI for choosing export format, JPEG quality, and downloading the processed image.
frontend/src/components/ImageDropzone.ts: Drag‑and‑drop and file‑picker image upload component with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ImagePreview.tsx: Displays a canvas-generated image preview with a loading overlay and shows metadata such as filename, size, dimensions, and format.
frontend/src/components/ResizeControls.t: Provides UI controls for adjusting image width, height, aspect ratio, and resize mode, updating processing parameters accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for client‑side image processing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/exportImage.ts: Exports a processed canvas image as a downloadable PNG or JPEG file with appropriate quality settings.
frontend/src/lib/imageMetadata.ts: Loads an image file to extract metadata such as dimensions, size, type, and returns an ImageMetadata object.
frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts: Resizes an image and applies brightness, contrast, and saturation adjustments, returning a processed canvas.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for image metadata and processing parameters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, existing features, requirements, and metadata for a photo resizing and enhancement web app.
